Key Match Events: Luka Doncic finished the game with 32 points, while Dereck Lively II, Kyrie Irving, and Daniel Gafford all notched double-figures in support.
Pre-Game Insights: The Magic are without star forward Paolo Banchero, who suffered a torn oblique and will be sidelined indefinitely.
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley said 'It sucks. There's no other way to put it.' regarding Banchero's injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic rank 25th in the NBA in scoring, a similar location to where they finished last year at No. 24.
The Magic struggled to score, finishing 8-for-41 (19.5%) on three-pointers, their worst rate in the young season.
Others: The Magic will try to tread water without their star in the coming games, facing the Oklahoma City Thunder (6-0) tonight.
